JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities:       Complete software lifecycle involvement from initial specification through release and implementation     Candidate will be involved in development activities using Java/Spring-Hibernate, JSON, XML, JMS, JBPM     Interaction with peers, Development Leads, Quality Assurance, DBA, UNIX Administrator.     Has worked on Enterprise web application     Has good understanding of Spring / hibernate framework     Has good understanding of Database and can write complex SQL statements     Has Good understanding of components involved in an enterprise web application such as tomcat and JBOSS     Has worked in a team of more than 10 engineers and is a good team player     Be able to provide work status and highlight risks on time. Has worked in an Agile environment     Working Knowledge of knockout, JQuery, JMS, JBPM     Has written JUnit test cases and is familiar with build process and continuous integration.
